name: The Game of the Chain
description:
Submission for the Mini Jame Gam #9 For prisoner #09452 You have been selected by the mayor to participate in the fifteenth game of the chain. The mayor thought it would be a good idea to replace your death penalty with this event, maybe you even get lucky and get your parole by winning!

How is your game related to the Theme and Special Object?

Well the theme was "only one" and here it is used in the story, since only one of the participants can remain to win his parole.

As for the object, not only is the game related to a chain, but you have to hit the largest number of chains of arrows to win.
